Actions with mo¶

In this section we will describe how mo elements will handle DOM events.

Mouse over and out¶

When the pointing device is moved onto an mo the element should change its background color (default to orange).

When the pointing device is moved away from an mo it should change its background color to original value.

This behavior can be achieve changing the color value attribute.

Click¶

When clicked it will try to perform the operation.
